productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Good for thick, coarse, curly or moisture-deprived hair. Vegan + cruelty-free conditioner.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare: R+Co Conditioner Moisture-deprived hair. Good For: Thick, curly, frizzy hair. Revitalizes dry hair, restores moisture + shine. Benefit: Smoothes the look + feel of hair. 9/10 Moisture: 6/10 6/10 Weight: 7/10 Moisture-deprived hair. Good For: Camera-Ready hair. Revitalizes dry hair, restores moisture + shine. Benefit: Body, shine, strength, smoothness. 9/10 Moisture: 7/10 6/10 Weight: 3/10 Moisture-deprived hair. Good For: Hair in need of volume. Revitalizes dry hair, restores moisture + shine. Benefit: Thickens + strengthens. 9/10 Moisture: 2/10 6/10 Weight: 4/10 Moisture-deprived hair. Good For: Color-treated hair. Revitalizes dry hair, restores moisture + shine. Benefit: Preserve + prolong your shade (up to 10 washes) 9/10 Moisture: 6/10 6/10 Weight: 5/10

Complete The Look ATLANTIS B5 Moisturizing Shampoo Immerse yourself in moisture and shine with ATLANTIS. This super-hydrating shampoo brings dry and tired hair back to life while countering the effects of sun, coloring, and blow-drying. HIGH DIVE Moisture + Shine Crème Plunge into deep hydration and reflective shine with HIGH DIVE. Formulated to smooth and seal the hair, it moisturizes, softens and drowns out frizz. BADLANDS Dry Shampoo Paste One part dry shampoo, one part styling paste, 100% badass. Use when you want to extend the life of a blow-out or add volumizing texture. WATERFALL Moisture Lotion Cascade into an overflow of moisture + shine. This lotion will leave hair glossy, soft and manageable. Perfect for fine to medium and extra-long hair.

Product Point of Difference Ingredient conscious formulas with outstanding performance + killer fragrances Our award-winning line of products feature unique ingredients and benefits designed to deliver immediate, high-performing results while keeping hair and scalp health at top-of-mind. All our formulas are color-safe, heat and UV protective, vegan, cruelty and gluten-free, and without harmful ingredients such as parabens, sulfates (SLS or SLES), mineral oil and petrolatum. Good Hair That's Good For the Earth R+Eco/Sustainability We are amping up our commitment to reduce our footprint on earth with the introduction of post-consumer resource (PCR) packaging. We are focused not only on good hair, but also what is good for the planet! Look for the R+Eco logo as we take our commitment one step further by transitioning all R+Co bottles to 55% PCR material. PCR packaging is gathered from domestic US sources AND reduces virgin plastic consumption + decreases the use of fossil fuels and energy used in package manufacturing. 100% Vegan, Gluten + Cruelty-free R+Co Is Leaping-Bunny Certified A well-known certification, Leaping Bunny recognizes brands free of animal testing. ALL YOU NEED IS GOOD HAIR Top hairdressers collaborating on an award-winning product line From new talents to legendary superstars, we consult with those whose skills and influences differ from our own. Whether we work with someone to develop a new product or invite them to speak at one of our happenings, we keep the diversity and range of our collective shifting to reflect an ever-changing world. Perfect playlists for work + play R+Co Talk Radio Listen to our collection of curated sounds by The Collective, beauty + music influencers and other special guests!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is amazing for fine, damaged hair!
reviews.reviewText: This product is extremely moisturizing!!! I have damaged hair from bleaching it for years and this conditioner makes my hair so soft fleas frizzy. It makes my hair more manageable when I let it air dry and nourished for when I style it! Definitely worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I read reviews claiming it stinks, is too moisturizing or not the original product, however, I love it! It is lightweight, smells good, is moisturizing but not to the point of feeling tacky. I really like it and this coming from someone who loves Pravana hair products and other professional hair care products. R+Co has brought life back into my kinky curls and tamed my frizziness. My hair is so soft and smooth and hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a lux conditioner. Great for fine hair !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I always use this conditioner after swimming in a pool and it makes a noticeable difference in the quality of my hair. I highly recommend using the shampoo along with it. The only downside is that it's quite expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and is very moisturizing! Do not put on your roots though because it does make hair look greasy sooner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replenished my dry hair
reviews.reviewText: I’m not positive what sheerness is suppose to mean, but the product itself isn’t sheer. Even so, I see zero build up from it and it makes my hair look shiny and feels soft after using it! The scent is pleasant and it really helped replenish the moisture to my hair after getting a balayage!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love R&Co to death
reviews.reviewText: from the smell to how it leaves my hair, i love it all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on different hair types
reviews.reviewText: My daughter said to buy it when we made plans to take our granddaughter to the beach, told me its the only product that works with her multi-type hair (3b around the hairline, and 3a and 2c on the crown). After years of tangles and knots, I can attest - this works great. I even used it on my hair (naturally 2b/3a) that I straighten. Did a great job keeping it soft and moisturized after days out in the sun, salt, and chlorine.
